articles.description: UNITED STATES: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) Chandra X-ray Observatory has released a composite image of Rosette Nebula.
articles.content: UNITED STATES: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) Chandra X-ray Observatory has released a composite image that depicts a section of the 5,000-light-year-distance Rosette Nebula… [+1683 chars]
